title: The Old Firehouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A student-friendly pub offering pub food menu with a section for vegetarian/vegan items. There are around 4 or 5 vegan choices plus 2 vegan pizzas on the evening pizza menu; has vegan cheese. Sources fair trade and local products. Real ale and cider. Old and atmospheric, live music sometimes.
